lemma HPhase1or2ReadThen_valueChosen2: assumes act: "HPhase1or2ReadThen s s' q d pp" and asm4: "\<forall>d\<in>D. b \<le> bal(disk s d p) \<and>(\<forall>q.( phase s q = 1 \<and> b \<le>mbal(dblock s q) \<and> hasRead s q d p ) \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>br\<in>blocksRead s q d. b \<le> bal(block br)))" (is "?P s") shows "?P s'"
